lines.text: [other Our Gang members are about to enter the office building, as they search for a temporary dad for Mickey]

[on the telephone]
I'll read the factory for you madam. You want a chauffeur, who can take care of the baby, and do light housework. That'll be six dollars a week, as he furnishes you the lawnmower yes'm, I'll try, oh and you want one that can play a piano, yes madam good-bye.

[seeing the Gang members walk in so quick]
What do you want?
Have you got any fathers for rent, lady?
Fathers? Why, no. We're fresh out of them. But, if you try the County Hospital, they have them every day.
[and she clicks her tongue twice, in humor, as they leave]
